#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll double
#define ln int
#define INF 5000
ll slope(ln x1,ln y1,ln x2 , ln y2)
{
	if (x1==0 && x2 == 0 )return 0;
	
	else if ((x1-x2)==0 && x1 > 0 && x2 > 0)return INF;

	else
		return ( (double)(y2-y1)/(double)(x2-x1) );

}

int main()
{
ll test,n,k,count,ans,s;

	vector<ll>slo;

		

	cin >> test;

	while (test--)
	{
	ln x[11000]={0},y[11000]={0},i,j;	
		cin >> n;
		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
 			cin >> x[i] >> y[i];
		ans=2;
		if (n==1){cout <<"1\n";continue;}
		if (n==2){cout <<"2\n";continue;}
		for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ )
		{
			slo.clear();
			for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
			{
				if (i==j)continue;
				s = slope(x[i],y[i],x[j],y[j]);
				slo.push_back(s);
			}		
				sort(slo.begin() , slo.end());
			count=0;
//			for(j=0;j<slo.size();j++)cout<<slo[j]<<" ";cout << endl;
			for (j=0;j<slo.size()-1;j++)
			{
				if (slo[j] == slo[j+1])count++;
			}
			count+=2;//cout <<"count "<<count<<endl;
			ans=max(ans,count);					
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
}
